io.lettuce.core

类 ReadFrom

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.ReadFrom

  • public abstract class ReadFrom
extends Object
    Defines from which Redis nodes data is read.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  ReadFrom.Nodes
      Descriptor of nodes that are available for the current read operation.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ReadFrom MASTER
      Setting to read from the master only.
      static ReadFrom MASTER_PREFERRED
      Setting to read preferred from the master and fall back to a slave if the master is not available.
      static ReadFrom NEAREST
      Setting to read from the nearest node.
      static ReadFrom SLAVE
      Setting to read from the slave only.
      static ReadFrom SLAVE_PREFERRED
      Setting to read preferred from slaves and fall back to master if no slave is not available.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReadFrom() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract List<RedisNodeDescription> select(ReadFrom.Nodes nodes)
      Chooses the nodes from the matching Redis nodes that match this read selector.
      static ReadFrom valueOf(String name)
      Retrieve the ReadFrom preset by name.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • MASTER

        public static final ReadFrom MASTER
        Setting to read from the master only.

      • MASTER_PREFERRED

        public static final ReadFrom MASTER_PREFERRED
        Setting to read preferred from the master and fall back to a slave if the master is not available.

      • SLAVE_PREFERRED

        public static final ReadFrom SLAVE_PREFERRED
        Setting to read preferred from slaves and fall back to master if no slave is not available.
        从以下版本开始:
        4.4

      • SLAVE

        public static final ReadFrom SLAVE
        Setting to read from the slave only.

      • NEAREST

        public static final ReadFrom NEAREST
        Setting to read from the nearest node.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ReadFrom

        public ReadFrom()

    • 方法详细资料

      • select

        public abstract List<RedisNodeDescription> select(ReadFrom.Nodes nodes)
        Chooses the nodes from the matching Redis nodes that match this read selector.
        参数:
        nodes - set of nodes that are suitable for reading
        返回:
        List of RedisNodeDescriptions that are selected for reading

      • valueOf

        public static ReadFrom valueOf(String name)
        Retrieve the ReadFrom preset by name.
        参数:
        name - the name of the read from setting
        返回:
        the ReadFrom preset
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if name is empty, null or the ReadFrom preset is unknown.
